TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit MinMaxParagraphWidth extends System.ValueType implements class System.IEquatable`1<valuetype System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.MinMaxParagraphWidth>

Docs.summary: Represents the smallest and largest possible paragraph width that can fully contain the specified text content.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.MinMaxParagraphWidth.MinWidth%2A> property to generate the minimum paragraph width for the formatted lines of text.
[!code-csharp[TextFormattingSnippets#TextFormattingSnippet3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextFormattingSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#textformattingsnippet3)] [!code-vb[TextFormattingSnippets#TextFormattingSnippet3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextFormattingSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#textformattingsnippet3)]

Docs.summary: Gets the largest paragraph width possible that can fully contain the specified text content.
Docs.value: A that represents the largest paragraph width possible.

Docs.summary: Gets the smallest paragraph width possible that can fully contain the specified text content.
Docs.value: A that represents the smallest paragraph width possible.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The minimum paragraph width corresponds to the word that has the greatest width in the text content.
## Examples The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.MinMaxParagraphWidth.MinWidth%2A> property to generate the minimum paragraph width for the formatted lines of text.
[!code-csharp[TextFormattingSnippets#TextFormattingSnippet3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextFormattingSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#textformattingsnippet3)] [!code-vb[TextFormattingSnippets#TextFormattingSnippet3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextFormattingSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#textformattingsnippet3)]
